title: Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a Data Scientist with experience in Python, Machine Learning, Pandas, and SQL. Familiarity with statistics and model evaluation required.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Seeking a Frontend Developer skilled in JavaScript, React and CSS. Experience with responsive design and modern frontend tooling is a plus.

title: Product Manager
description: The Product Manager will lead roadmapping, stakeholder management, and coordinate across engineering and design. Strong communication skills required.
